      • getNoteName

        public java.lang.String getNoteName​(Key key,
                                    boolean forceNatural)
        Returns the name of this note in the given key. Accidentals are spelled with respect to the key, and are represented as "F#", "Bb", etc.
        Parameters:
        key -
